title: Jen Psaki snaps at reporter after question on COVID origins
description: Jen Psaki lost her patience with Fox News' Peter Doocy at Monday's press briefing as he pressed her on whether the White House was doing enough to expose the origins of COVID-19.

title: Donald arrives at Trump Tower as Republican 2024 hopefuls speak at Reagan Library
description: Former President Donald Trump was captured arriving at Trump Tower in Manhattan Monday morning.

title: Joe Biden's daily routine: President, 78, lifts WEIGHTS, eats cookies and calls Hunter every day
description: Joe Biden is a creature of habit. A new report reveals he starts his days lifting weights and watching MSNBC's 'Morning Joe,.' He also has a sweet tooth for orange Gatorade and chocolate chip cookies.

title: US Capitol riots: Donald Trump slams 'wayward' 35 Republican rebels who voted for commission
description: House speaker Nancy Pelosi applauded 35 Republicans who voted in favor of a 9/11-style commission to investigate the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol.

title: Biden slams 'ugly poison' of racism and signs anti-Asian hate crime bill
description: President Joe Biden slammed the 'ugly poison' of racism that's 'plagued' the United States and then signed the anti-Asian hate crime bill at the White House Thursday.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene calls Pelosi a 'Nazi' for refusing to lift House chamber mask mandates
description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene compared Speaker Nancy Pelosi's mask mandate for the House chamber to Nazi rule, while GOP. Rep. Thomas Massie tossed his mask citation in the trash.

title: Donald Trump decided not to fire FBI Director Christopher Wray because Bill Barr threatened to quit
description: President Donald Trump decided against firing the FBI director he appointed, Christopher Wray, after Attorney General Bill Barr threatened to quit.

title: Democrats includingBernie Sanders and 'the Squad' try to stop Biden's $735m weapons sale to Israel
description: Bernie Sanders launched an effort Thursday to block the sale of $735 million in precision-guided weapons to Israel as President Biden comes under pressure to stand up for Palestinian human rights.

title: Governor Cuomo blasts reporter who asked him whether he 'profited off the backs of dead New Yorkers'
description: The governor was asked about his book Thursday. After he asked if he had profited on the 'backs of dead New Yorkers', Cuomo replied: 'That's stupid. Next question.'

title: Donald and Melania Trump still have $1.3m government payroll for their aides
description: Government documents reveal that former President Trump has staff on the payroll earning $1.3 million at government expense under a presidential transition law.

title: Matt Gaetz and three others named in subpoena over Florida Congressman's sex trafficking probe
description: The subpoena was sent to an unidentified individual and requested information related to a grand jury investigation into alleged 'commercial sex acts with adult and minor women'.

title: Israel-Gaza: Rashida Tlaib tells Joe Biden Palestinian human rights are 'not a bargaining chip'
description: Rep. Rashida Tlaib tore into U.S. policy toward Israel in a tarmac conversation with President Joe Biden Tuesday, telling him: 'Palestinian human rights are not a bargaining chip.'

title: House passes anti-Asian hate crime bill in bipartisan vote of 364-62 and sends it to Biden's desk
description: The House passed an anti-discrimination bill to address the rise in hate crimes against Asians on Tuesday afternoon, with a bipartisan vote of 364 for the bill and 62 against.

title: Andrew Cuomo was paid $5m for his COVID book and donated $500k to charity
description: Cuomo's controversial book American Crisis: Leadership Lessons from the COVID-19 Pandemic, was released in October, just before New York's COVID-19 numbers spiked again.

title: Joe Biden and Kamala Harris finally go maskless for indoor White House event
description: Four days after the CDC said immunized people could go maskless, President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris made their first indoor public appearance without face coverings.

title: 80% Republicans BACK ousting Liz Cheney as two-thirds claim loyalty to Trump is 'important'
description: Eight in 10 Republicans agree with the House GOP's decision to vote out Rep. Liz Cheney from her leadership position for breaking with Donald Trump, a new poll revealed Sunday.

title: US Election 2020: Donald Trump hints at 'bombshell' Michigan fraud case
description: Donald Trump on Monday said there had been a 'bombshell' decision in Michigan. He appeared to be referencing a hearing in a rural northern area, which he won.

title: Trump says 'there is no way Biden won the election' as new poll says 67% of Republican voters agree
description: A CBS News poll published on Sunday showed that 67 per cent of self-described Republicans did not think that President Joe Biden was the legitimate winner of the election.

title: House Republicans prepare to elect Trump supporter Elise Stefanik as conference chair
description: Donald Trump congratulated Elise Stefanik for her victory after House Republicans elected her to their leadership team after ousting Liz Cheney.

title: Joe Biden tells reporters 'I'm not supposed to be answering all these questions'
description: Biden told White House reporters: 'You guys are bad, I'm not supposed to be answering all these questions. I'm supposed to leave but I can't resist your questions.'

title: Jill Biden follows new CDC rules and removes face mask on trip with Jennifer Garner in West Virginia
description: President Joe Biden told Americans who have their full COVID vaccine to take their masks off and his wife Jill, visiting West Virginia with Jennifer Garner, did just that.

title: More than 120 retired military officers write to Joe Biden backing 2020 US election fraud claims
description: A group of more than 120 retired military officers have written President Joe Biden to tell him his election was less than legitimate - while questioning his mental acuity.

title: The 150 Republicans - including four former governors - who have threatened to form a third party
description: A group of 150 Republicans signed a letter Thursday where they vowed to 'reimagine a party dedicated to our founding ideals or else hasten the creation of such an alternative.'

title: Mitch McConnell calls rollback of 2017 tax cuts to fund infrastructure 'red line'
description: 'We're not interested in reopening the 2017 tax bill,' Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell said after a White House meeting with President Joe Biden.

title: Republican Leader Kevin McCarthy says 'nobody is questioning legitimacy' of 2020 US election
description: Kevin McCarthy said he believes claims that Joe Biden isn't the legitimate president are 'over with' just after the GOP leader facilitated the vote to oust Liz Cheney for not backing claims of voter fraud.

title: Jill Biden takes Joe Manchin on West Virginia trip with Jennifer Garner
description: Jill Biden is joining White House efforts to woo Democratic Senator Joe Manchin, bringing him on her plane for her trip to West Virginia on Thursday to hang out with her and actress Jennifer Garner.

title: More than 100 Republicans threaten to split from party unless it moves away from Donald Trump
description: The letter, headlined: 'A Call For American Renewal,' is an exploratory move toward forming a breakaway party, two of its organizers, including former White House staffer Miles Taylor (right) said.

title: Covid US: Dr Anthony Fauci and Senator Rand Paul clash on origins of virus in Senate hearing
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci and Rand Paul squared off over the origins of the coronavirus, with the Republican senator accusing the NIH funding risky Chinese research into bat coronaviruses.

title: Colonial Pipeline attack: Republicans accuse Joe Biden of being 'weak' on Russia
description: Republicans are attacking President Joe Biden, calling him 'weak' on Russia after the FBI said DarkSide was responsible for the ransomware attack on a pipeline and officials pointed fingers at Russia.

title: Joe Biden says anyone unemployed who is offered 'suitable job' must take it or lose benefits
description: Biden said that anyone taking unemployment who gets offered a 'suitable job' must take it after experts revealed those making $32,000 before COVID now earn more from benefits

title: Texas Democrat says Biden is making migrant facilities look empty by moving children into tents
description: Democratic Rep. Henry Cuellar accused the administration of moving unaccompanied minors from one tent to another even as it touts reductions in children held in Border Patrol custody.

title: Homeland Security Secretary will tour Texas migrant facility Friday
description: Homeland Security Sec. Alejandro Mayorkas is visiting a Texas border facility after a Texas Democratic lawmaker said the administration was moving child migrants from tent to tent.
